message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $125. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your response.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. Considering the product's worth is $120 to you, I'm willing to pay $115 for it. I hope we can come to a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on the value of the product to both parties, I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product. This aligns closely with the perceived value to me and offers a fair compromise. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and look forward to your feedback.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $117 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your effort to reach a fair agreement, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $118 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between the value the product holds for both of us. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you and look forward to your positive response.
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think we can find a better price. I'm willing to go up to $116 for the product. I hope this is a price we can agree on.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your perspective and am willing to consider your latest offer. Based on our negotiations, I propose to sell the product to you for $117. This price represents a fair compromise and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us. I hope this offer meets your expectations and look forward to your confirmation.
I'm close to accepting, but I'm still trying to save a bit more. I'm willing to go up to $116.50 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering our negotiations so far.

Thank you for your patience and willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering our previous discussions and the value you place on the product, I am willing to sell it to you for $117.5. This price represents a fair compromise and I believe it will be satisfactory for both parties involved. I hope this offer is acceptable to you and look forward to your positive response.
